title: card.dfu Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Used to configure a Notecard for Notecard Outboard Firmware Update.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

name.description: One of the supported classes of host MCU. Supported MCU classes are 'esp32', 'stm32', 'stm32-bi', '-'

on.description: Set to true to enable Notecard Outboard Firmware Update

off.description: Set to true to disable Notecard Outboard Firmware Update from occurring

seconds.description: When used with 'off':true, disable Notecard Outboard Firmware Update operations for the specified number of seconds

stop.description: Set to true to disable the host RESET that is normally performed on the host MCU when the Notecard starts up
